title: I accidentally spent $167 more on groceries this week than I planned!!
description: I accidentally spent $167 more on groceries this week than I had planned on!!! Here’s what happened…  I went to place my Kroger delivery order yesterday. When I went to checkout, they offered me some great deals that were flash sales (you’ll usually get offered these if you choose to have your order delivered fromRead More
author: Crystal Paine
